title: Losing LP because of trolls
body: I'm tired of getting trolls in my team. If I just record my matches can I just send them somewhere so I don't lose points unfairly

replies.body:
I might record games anyway regardless, 1 you can actually re-watch your games to figure out if you can do better.
Its what I do and it helps.
And it serves as protection, if someone tries banning you or you get wrongfully banned during that game you can use it as evidence in a support ticket. To prove, you didn't afk- feed  intentionally- or be toxic (Unless you were).
And if things get REALLY out of hand you can submit the clips in a support ticket of someone being really horrible.

While it sure is frustrating af to lose a game through minimal fault of your own, it is a part of the whole team experience. 

I suggest [creating/joining a dynamic queue group](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/team-recruitment), so that you can really get to know each others strengths and weaknesses as well as being able to communicate more clearly. There is literally no reason not to, with the possibility to gain extra mastery points, ip and soon stuff to do with the hex tech crafting system.
